title: O'Neill Technology - Hyperflow
description:
O'Neill's latest innovation - HyperFlow - is a unique pocket &
vent system for more ventilation and therefore quick temperature
adjustment. Easily accessible even wearing a backpack, it's the
perfect way to regulate your body temperature on the mountain.
